About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Gunnar Bates: Web Developer

Hello! I'm Gunnar, and I'm thrilled to welcome you to my web development journey. With a strong foundation in information technology, I embarked on a four-year program in high school where I immersed myself in the world of programming languages, including C#, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and Java. These formative years laid the groundwork for my passion and skills in web development. In my recent pursuits, I've been enthusiastically relearning and expanding my knowledge of HTML and CSS. What drives me is the desire to create web projects that are not just visually appealing but also dynamic and scalable. Each project I undertake is an opportunity to push my boundaries and explore new possibilities in the ever-evolving field of web development.

But it doesn't stop there. My journey in software programming is just beginning, and my pursuit of knowledge is relentless. As you explore my portfolio, you'll get a glimpse of the projects I've worked on and the skills I bring to the table. Whether you're a fellow developer, a potential client, or just someone interested in the world of web development, I invite you to connect with me. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions, ideas, or opportunities for collaboration. Together, we can create web experiences that leave a lasting impact. Thank you for visiting, and I look forward to connecting with you on this exciting journey.
